name: Hydra
description: A parallelized login cracker which supports numerous protocols to attack.

name: Peass-ng
description: Privilege escalation tools for Windows and Linux/Unix* and MacOS.

name: Fcrackzip
description: A fast password cracker for ZIP archives.

name: Hexedit
description: A hexadecimal file viewer and editor.

name: Xxd
description: A utility to create and modify hexadecimal dump files.

name: Shodan.io
description: A search engine for Internet-connected devices.

name: Searchsploit
description: Searchsploit is a command-line utility used for searching through the Exploit Database, a collection of exploits and vulnerabilities for a variety of software applications. And it is also included in Metasploit
